text: Need Andrew Clark for Supercheap Auto campaign. Budget around $3,193, looking for 2 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Facebook post, 3 x TikTok video, 1 x TikTok video, 2 x Instagram post. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
